description: The end of the catalogue is ¡°emotional but rational¡± as fewer people are reading it, the company says.
title: Ikea scraps traditional catalogue after 70 years
title_page: Ikea scraps traditional catalogue after 70 years - BBC News
maintext: "For both customers and co-workers, the Ikea Catalogue is a publication that brings a lot of emotions, memories and joy. For 70 years it has been one of our most unique and iconic products."
